channel.title: Upload sample data on Advanced Analytics for Web
channel.description: Recent content in Upload sample data on Advanced Analytics for Web

item.title: Data upload
item.description: Attachments sample_events.csv (36 MB) snowflake_upload.py (9 KB) Python Snowflake Web Interface One option is to load the sample data to the warehouse using Python as described in the below steps. Please download both the sample_events.csv and the snowflake_upload.py files from the attachments at the top of this page as you will need both. Step 1: Set up your environment Set up a virtual environment (recommended) and install the snowflake-connector-python package (tested with version 2.
